title: Apple Car self-driving could take cues from Siri and iPhone input
content:
Earlier this week, it was revealed that Apple has hired Desi Ujkashevic, a former Ford executive, to join the efforts of the Apple Car project. Since then, questions continue to arise on whether or not the ‘Apple Car’ will become a real thing. 

more…

The post Apple Car self-driving could take cues from Siri and iPhone input appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The Apple Car patent regards autonomous vehicles, specifically an advanced “Guidance System” that can refine final destinations.
